mapper.select: -- FsCmtSelectDto 형태에 맞춰서 Select SELECT FsCmt.id ,FsCmt.fs_board_id ,FsCmt.content ,FsCmt.deleted ,FsCmt.created_at ,FsCmt.modified_at FROM FsCmt WHERE FsCmt.id = #{id}

SELECT FsCmt.id ,FsCmt.fs_board_id ,FsCmt.content ,FsCmt.deleted ,FsCmt.created_at ,FsCmt.modified_at FROM FsCmt WHERE FsCmt.id is not null AND FsCmt.fs_board_id = #{fs_board_id} AND FsCmt.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND FsCmt.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY FsCmt.created_at DESC

SELECT FsCmt.id ,FsCmt.fs_board_id ,FsCmt.content ,FsCmt.deleted ,FsCmt.created_at ,FsCmt.modified_at FROM FsCmt WHERE FsCmt.id is not null AND FsCmt.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= FsCmt.created_at AND FsCmt.fs_board_id = #{fs_board_id} AND FsCmt.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND FsCmt.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY FsCmt.created_at ORDER BY FsCmt.fs_board_id ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(FsCmt.id) as listsize FROM FsCmt WHERE FsCmt.id is not null AND FsCmt.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= FsCmt.created_at AND FsCmt.fs_board_id = #{fs_board_id} AND FsCmt.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND FsCmt.deleted = #{deleted}
